data.actual_result: It opens a blank screen where trying to go back will reopen the window, getting you stuck in an infinite loop and forcing you to restart the app.
data.expected_result: The invite link gets properly resolved and you join the Server with no problems.
data.short_description: Attempting to join a Server and capitalizing a letter in the invite will get you stuck in a blank page.
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to Add Server and join one via invite (or from a link in the chat). - Capitalize one or more letters, like Discord-testers instead of discord-testers. - Try to join the Server and observe.
